message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $12,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a great asset to you.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $12,000 is too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $6,000 for it.  I believe that's a fair price.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $6,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $10,500 is still more than I'm comfortable spending.  I could go up to $7,000, but that's the absolute highest I can go.
